Socket Server (Class)¶

class socket_server.SocketServer[source]¶

The server for socket connections with the android tablets

hotplug_callback(context, device, event)[source]¶

Checks if the plugged in device is a nexus tablet and if so starts reverse port forwarding via adb

on_ploop(message='')[source]¶

Checks for the hotplug event

on_pstart()[source]¶

Sets up the hotplug_callback() to trigger when a usb device is plugged in

on_tloop()[source]¶

Listens for a connect from one of the android tablets and spins off a thread to handle it

on_tstart()[source]¶

Marks that the thread has started

setup_adb_bridge()[source]¶

Sets up reverse port forward for attached android devices via the android debug bridge (adb)

start()[source]¶

Starts the thread for accepting socket connections

stop()[source]¶

Stops each connection thread and the main accepting thread
